location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 101 to William Digges Latouche, Resident at Bussora [Basra], from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Reports news (via Mr Roger Orford) that French privateers have headed south from Bushire. Describes further details of the suspected French messenger and his interception.The letter also discusses other developments and administrative matters.
